title: DIY 5D Diamond Painting by Number Kits, Home Diamond Art Cross Stitch Full Drill Crystal Rhinestone Embroidery Craft for Adult Kids 12x16inch（Home）
features: ★【High Quality】High quality oil canvas with high definition printing, not easy to fade, not tired your eyes when painting pictures. The 5d diamond painting use environmentally-friendly odorless adhesive, super sticky, long-term preservation and make the diamonds not easy to fall off. Each diamond painting kit contains a set of tools for making paintings, no need to buy any other kits
★【Package including】1 x HD canvas，1 x Point diamond pen，1 xCubediamond tray，1 x Red glue clay，Colorful round diamonds.
★【stylish wall decor and gift】Perfect Gift and Unique Decoration:It's not only a great idea for cross stitch, embroider craft lovers, but also a wonderful gift for family and friends.

★【eco-friendly canvas】The 5D diamond is high clear printing oil canvas, non-toxic, waterproof, environmental protected, not easy to fold，will be never fade, making your room more vivifying and Shining in the light.

★【Add Joy To Life】DIY diamond painting can experience a sense of achievement, learn to reduce stress, emotional adjustment, enhance self-confidence and perseverance cultivate patience, the elderly and children are suitable.Finishing a DIY diamond painting is a process of constantly adjust yourself and share happy time with your family or friends. It will be improved to an educational parent-child cooperation When you complete this diamond painting with your child.
description: Product Description  1*High definition oil painting canvas; 1*Colorful magic diamonds; 1*Point diamond pen ; 1*diamond tray and Solid Glue;Without Frame Notice: 1.Please do not fold the canvas and lie down with creases,Please put it in a flat table during painting process. 2.Please don't pull plastic film on the picture at one time. First tear half to protect the glue from losing the adhesive. 3.Do not place diamonds where children can easily touch to avoid being swallowed by them Feature:Diamond cover the whole canvas complete, it is full diamond embroidery. NOTE 1.Find corresponding diamond bag according to numbers or letters. 2.Pull the diamonds into tray and shake. 3.Apply appropriate clay to penpoint. 4.Use the penpoint to adsorb diamond. 5.Stick diamond onto canvas's corresponding position. 6.Press the finished painting to make diamonds more fixed.  Please be noted :  the frame is not included. Get a proper frame to hang your finished painting from a local store.
